title: Railworks TS2015 Virtual Railroads DB BR103 Lufthansa Express
description:
DB BR103 Lufthansa Express with the LH cars Apmz and Bpmz

The vehicle package contains the vehicles on the route between Stuttgart and Frankfurt 
Lufthansa Express trains running from the 90s. The cars are converted 
Eurofima car with a customized on the Lufthansa interior design. 
The contained 103101-2 was the only Zuglok which accordingly also in the 
was repainted LH own color scheme. 
The cars contained have a simple passenger view, use the dynamic 
ID System of Train simulator and are compatible with the vR door locking system.

The contained mobile model of the series 103 is characterized by 
from extensive functions and is therefore not for beginners suitable in TS 
and not be moved without first an intensive look at the manual

download to get an overview of features and requirements 
to procure.
